00032 #define TIMEOUT 2000
00033 #define ISO_PORT 102

00035 extern int rlDebugPrintfState;
00036 
00037 rlSiemensTCP::rlSiemensTCP(const char *a, int _plc_type, int _fetch_write, int rackNumber, int slotNumber)
00038              :rlSocket(a,ISO_PORT,1)
00039 {
00040   plc_type = _plc_type;
00041   fetch_write = _fetch_write;
00042   rack_number = rackNumber;
00043   slot_number = slotNumber;
00044   doConnect();
00045 }
00046 
00047 rlSiemensTCP::~rlSiemensTCP()
00048 {
00049   rlSocket::disconnect();
00050 }
00051 
00052 void rlSiemensTCP::doConnect()
00053 {
00054   int i,i2,ret,length;
00055   static const unsigned char s7_200_connect_block[] =
00056     {3,0,0,22,0x11,0xE0,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x01,0x00,0xC1,2,'M','W',0xC2,2,'M','W',0xC0,1,9};
00057   static const unsigned char s7_300_connect_block[] =
00058     {3,0,0,22,0x11,0xE0,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x01,0x00,0xC1,2,1  ,0  ,0xC2,2,1  ,2  ,0xC0,1,9};
00059   static const unsigned char s7_400_connect_block[] =
00060     {3,0,0,22,0x11,0xE0,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x01,0x00,0xC1,2,1  ,0  ,0xC2,2,1  ,3  ,0xC0,1,9};
00061   static const unsigned char other_connect_block[] =
00062     {3,0,0,22,0x11,0xE0,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x01,0x00,0xC1,2,1  ,0  ,0xC2,2,0  ,1  ,0xC0,1,9};
00063   unsigned char connect_block[22];
00064 
00065   unsigned char connect_block2[] = 
00066     {0x03,0x00,0x00,0x19,0x02,0xF0,0x80,0x32,0x01,0x00,0x00,0xCC,0xC1,0x00,0x08,0x00,0x00,0xF0,0x00,0x00,0x01,0x00,0x01,0x03,0xC0};  
00067   unsigned char buf[512];
00068 
00069   if     (plc_type == S7_200) memcpy(connect_block,s7_200_connect_block,sizeof(connect_block));
00070   else if(plc_type == S7_300) memcpy(connect_block,s7_300_connect_block,sizeof(connect_block));
00071   else if(plc_type == S7_400) memcpy(connect_block,s7_400_connect_block,sizeof(connect_block));
00072   else                        memcpy(connect_block,other_connect_block,sizeof(connect_block));
00073   if(rack_number != -1) connect_block[17] = rack_number;
00074   if(slot_number != -1) connect_block[18] = slot_number;
00075 
00076   for(i=0; i<3; i++)
00077   {
00078     if(rlSocket::connect() >= 0)
00079     {
00080       // exchange TSAP
00081       rlDebugPrintf("write connect_block\n");
00082       rlSocket::write(connect_block,sizeof(connect_block));
00083       ret = rlSocket::read(&ih,sizeof(ih),TIMEOUT);
00084       rlDebugPrintf("read ih ret=%d\n",ret);
00085       if(ret <= 0) { rlSocket::disconnect(); continue; }
00086       length = ih.length_high*256 + ih.length_low;
00087       rlDebugPrintf("read buf length=%d\n",length);
00088       ret = rlSocket::read(buf,length-sizeof(ih),TIMEOUT);
00089       rlDebugPrintf("read buf ret=%d\n",ret);
00090       if(ret <= 0) { rlSocket::disconnect(); continue; }
00091       if(length == 22)
00092       {
00093         for(i2=0; i2<3; i2++)
00094         {
00095           rlDebugPrintf("write connect_block2\n");
00096           rlSocket::write(connect_block2,sizeof(connect_block2));
00097           ret = rlSocket::read(&ih,sizeof(ih),TIMEOUT);
00098           rlDebugPrintf("read2 ih ret=%d\n",ret);
00099           length = ih.length_high*256 + ih.length_low;
00100           rlDebugPrintf("read2 buf length=%d\n",length);
00101           ret = rlSocket::read(buf,length-sizeof(ih),TIMEOUT);
00102           rlDebugPrintf("read2 buf ret=%d\n",ret);
00103           if(ret <= 0) { rlSocket::disconnect(); continue; }
00104           if(ret > 0) 
00105           {
00106             rlDebugPrintf("connect success\n");
00107             return;
00108           }  
00109         }
00110         rlSocket::disconnect();
00111         return;
00112       }
00113     }
00114     else
00115     {
00116       rlsleep(100);
00117       rlDebugPrintf("connect failed\n");
00118     }
00119   }
00120 }
00121 
00122 int rlSiemensTCP::getOrg(int org)
00123 {
00124   int ret;
00125   switch(org)
00126   {
00127     case ORG_DB:   ret = 0x84;  break;    //[10] Datenbaustein
00128     case ORG_M:    ret = 0x83;  break;    //[10] Merker
00129     case ORG_E:    ret = 0x81;  break;    //[10] Eingang
00130     case ORG_A:    ret = 0x82;  break;    //[10] Ausgang
00131     case ORG_PEPA: ret = 0x84;  break;    //[10] not tested
00132     case ORG_Z:    ret = 0x84;  break;    //[10] not tested
00133     case ORG_T:    ret = 29;    break;    //[10] Timer
00134     default:       return 0x83; break;
00135   }
00136   return ret;
00137 }
00138 
00139 int rlSiemensTCP::write(int org, int dbnr, int start_adr, int len, const unsigned char *buf, int function)
00140 {
00141   int i,ibuf,ret,len_byte,length;
00142   if(rlSocket::isConnected() == 0) doConnect();
00143   if(rlSocket::isConnected() == 0) return -1;
00144 
00145   len_byte = len;
00146   //if(org == ORG_DB) len_byte *= 2;
00147   //if(org == ORG_Z)  len_byte *= 2;
00148   //if(org == ORG_T)  len_byte *= 2;
00149   
00150   if((plc_type == S5 || plc_type == S7_300 || plc_type == S7_400) && fetch_write == 1)
00151   {
00152     rlDebugPrintf("using fetch_write\n");
00153     length = sizeof(ih) + sizeof(wh) + len_byte;
00154     ih.version  = 3;
00155     ih.reserved = 0;
00156     ih.length_high = length / 256;
00157     ih.length_low  = length & 0x0ff;
00158     wh.ident[0]        = 'S';
00159     wh.ident[1]        = '5';
00160     wh.header_len      = 16;
00161     wh.ident_op_code   = 1;
00162     wh.op_code_len     = 3;
00163     wh.op_code         = 3;
00164     wh.ident_org_block = 3;
00165     wh.len_org_block   = 8;
00166     wh.org_block       = (unsigned char) org;
00167     wh.dbnr            = (unsigned char) dbnr;
00168     wh.start_adr[0]    = (unsigned char) start_adr / 256;
00169     wh.start_adr[1]    = (unsigned char) start_adr & 0x0ff;;
00170     wh.len[0]          = (unsigned char) len / 256;
00171     wh.len[1]          = (unsigned char) len & 0x0ff;;
00172     wh.spare1          = 0x0ff;
00173     wh.spare1_len      = 2;
00174     ret = rlSocket::write(&ih,sizeof(ih));
00175     rlDebugPrintf("write ih ret=%d\n",ret);
00176     if(ret < 0) return ret;
00177     ret = rlSocket::write(&wh,sizeof(wh));
00178     rlDebugPrintf("write wh ret=%d\n",ret);
00179     if(ret < 0) return ret;
00180     ret = rlSocket::write(buf,len_byte);
00181     rlDebugPrintf("write buf ret=%d\n",ret);
00182     if(ret < 0) return ret;
00183     ret = rlSocket::read(&ih,sizeof(ih),TIMEOUT);
00184     rlDebugPrintf("read ih ret=%d\n",ret);
00185     if(ret <= 0) return ret;
00186     ret = rlSocket::read(&wa,sizeof(wa),TIMEOUT);
00187     rlDebugPrintf("read wa ret=%d\n",ret);
00188     if(ret <= 0) return ret;
00189     if(wa.error_block != 0) return -1;
00190   }
00191   else
00192   {
00193     rlDebugPrintf("not using fetch_write\n");
00194     i = 0;
00195     pdu[i++] = 0x02;
00196     pdu[i++] = 0xF0;
00197     pdu[i++] = 0x80;
00198     pdu[i++] = 0x32;
00199     pdu[i++] = 0x01;
00200     pdu[i++] = 0x00;
00201     pdu[i++] = 0x00;
00202     pdu[i++] = 0x00;
00203     pdu[i++] = 0x00;
00204     pdu[i++] = 0x00;
00205     // The S7 update by Aljosa Merljak was tested on S7_200 only
00206     // You could set your plc_type to S7_200 also, even if you have S7_300 || S7_400
00207     // But only the else part has been tested with S7_300 and S7_400 up to now
00208     //if(plc_type == S7_200)
00209     // Hi Ken, currently only S7_200 was tested with this. But try if this also works with S7_400
00210     if(plc_type == S7_200 || plc_type == S7_300 || plc_type == S7_400)
00211     {
00212       ret = 0;
00213       switch(function)
00214       {
00215          case WriteBit:   ret = write_bit  (i, org, dbnr, start_adr, len, buf); break;
00216          case WriteByte:  ret = write_byte (i, org, dbnr, start_adr, len, buf); break;
00217       }
00218       if(ret < 0) return ret;
00219     }
00220     else
00221     {
00222       pdu[i++] = 0x0E;
00223       pdu[i++] = 0x00;
00224       pdu[i++] = 0x08;
00225       pdu[i++] = 0x05; //0 write
00226       pdu[i++] = 0x01; //1
00227       pdu[i++] = 0x12; //2
00228       pdu[i++] = 0x0A; //3
00229       pdu[i++] = 0x10; //4
00230       pdu[i++] = 0x02; //5
00231       pdu[i++] = len_byte / 256;   //6 0x00;
00232       pdu[i++] = len_byte & 0x0ff; //7 0x04;
00233       pdu[i++] = dbnr / 256;       //8 0x00;
00234       pdu[i++] = dbnr & 0x0ff;     //9 0x00;
00235       pdu[i++] = getOrg(org);      //10 
00236       pdu[i++] =  (start_adr/256)    & 0x0ff; //0x00;  // [11] start adr/bits
00237       pdu[i++] = ((start_adr*8)/256) & 0x0ff; //0x00;  // [12] start adr/bits
00238       pdu[i++] =  (start_adr*8)      & 0x0ff; //0x00;  // [13] start adr/bits
00239       pdu[i++] = 0x00;
00240       pdu[i++] = 0x04;
00241       pdu[i++] = 0x00;
00242       pdu[i++] = 0x20;
00243       for(ibuf=0; ibuf<len_byte; ibuf++)
00244       {
00245         pdu[i++] = buf[ibuf];
00246         if(i > (int) sizeof(pdu)) return -1;
00247       }
00248     }  
00249     ret = write_iso(pdu,i);
00250     if(ret < 0) return ret;
00251     ret = read_iso(pdu);
00252     if(ret < 0) return ret;
00253     if(pdu[15] != 0x05) return -1;
00254     if(pdu[16] != 0x01) return -1;
00255 
00256     // CODE from Víctor Centelles
00257     if(pdu[17] != 0xff)
00258     {
00259       if(pdu[17] == 0x0a){
00260         fprintf( stderr, " > Error: Trying to access a DB that does not exist\n");
00261         fprintf( stderr, "          Please, check that DB is set.   (error code: 10 (0x0a))\n");
00262         return -(pdu[17]);
00263       }
00264       else if(pdu[17] == 0x05){
00265         fprintf(stderr, " > Error: Trying to access an address that does not exist.\n");
00266         fprintf(stderr, "          Please, check the address range. (error code: 5 (0x05))\n");
00267         return -(pdu[17]);
00268       }
00269       else if(pdu[17] == 0x07){
00270         fprintf(stderr, " > Error: the write data size doesn't fit item size\n"); // NO TESTED!!!
00271         fprintf(stderr, "          Please, check the data size.     (error code: 7 (0x07))\n");
00272         return -(pdu[17]);
00273       }
00274       else{
00275         fprintf(stderr, " > Error: unknown error  (código %x!=0xff)\n", pdu[17]);
00276         return -(pdu[17]);
00277       }
00278     }
00279   }
00280 
00281   return len_byte;
00282 }
00283 
00284 int rlSiemensTCP::write_bit(int& i, int org, int dbnr, int start_adr, int len, const unsigned char *buf)
00285 {
00286   int j;
00287   pdu[i++] = 14 + 12 * (len - 1);
00288   pdu[i++] = 0x00;
00289   pdu[i++] = 6 * len - 1;
00290   pdu[i++] = 0x05;
00291   pdu[i++] = len;    
00292   for(j=0; j<len; j++)
00293   {
00294     pdu[i++] = 0x12;
00295     pdu[i++] = 0x0a;
00296     pdu[i++] = 0x10;
00297     pdu[i++] = 0x01;
00298     pdu[i++] = len / 256;        //6 0x00;
00299     pdu[i++] = 0x01;             //7 number of bytes in group
00300     pdu[i++] = dbnr / 256;       //8 0x00;
00301     pdu[i++] = dbnr & 0x0ff;     //9 0x00;
00302     pdu[i++] = getOrg(org);      //10 
00303     pdu[i++] =  (start_adr / 8)  / 0x10000;
00304     pdu[i++] = (start_adr / 256) & 0x0ff; //0x00;  // [12] start adr/bits
00305     pdu[i++] =  (start_adr + j)  & 0x0ff; //0x00;  // [13] start adr/bits     
00306   }
00307   for(j=0; j<len; j++)
00308   {
00309     pdu[i++] = 0x00;
00310     pdu[i++] = 0x03;
00311     pdu[i++] = 0x00;
00312     pdu[i++] = 0x01;
00313     pdu[i++] = (buf[j]>0) ? 0x01 : 0x00;
00314     if(j < len - 1 ) pdu[i++] = 0x00;
00315     if(i > (int) sizeof(pdu)) return -1;
00316   }
00317   return i;
00318 }
00319 
00320 int rlSiemensTCP::write_byte(int& i, int org, int dbnr, int start_adr, int len, const unsigned char *buf)
00321 {
00322   pdu[i++] = 0x0e;
00323   pdu[i++] = 0x00;
00324   pdu[i++] = 5 + len - 1;
00325   pdu[i++] = 0x05;
00326   pdu[i++] = 0x01;
00327   pdu[i++] = 0x12;
00328   pdu[i++] = 0x0a;
00329   pdu[i++] = 0x10;
00330   pdu[i++] = 0x02;
00331   pdu[i++] = len / 256;   //6 0x00;
00332   pdu[i++] = len;         //7 number of bytes
00333   pdu[i++] = dbnr / 256;       //8 0x00;
00334   pdu[i++] = dbnr & 0x0ff;     //9 0x00;
00335   pdu[i++] = getOrg(org);      //10 
00336   pdu[i++] =      start_adr      / 0x10000;
00337   pdu[i++] = ((start_adr*8)/256) & 0x0ff; //0x00;  // [12] start adr/bits
00338   pdu[i++] =   (start_adr*8)     & 0x0ff; //0x00;  // [13] start adr/bits     
00339   pdu[i++] = 0x00;
00340   pdu[i++] = 0x04;
00341   pdu[i++] = (len * 8) / 256;
00342   pdu[i++] = (len * 8) & 0xff;
00343   for(int ibuf=0; ibuf<len; ibuf++)
00344   {
00345     pdu[i++] = buf[ibuf];
00346     if(i > (int) sizeof(pdu)) return -1;
00347   }
00348   return i;
00349 }
00350 
00351 int rlSiemensTCP::fetch(int org, int dbnr, int start_adr, int len, unsigned char *buf)
00352 {
00353   int i,ret,len_byte,length;
00354 
00355   if(rlSocket::isConnected() == 0) doConnect();
00356   if(rlSocket::isConnected() == 0) return -1;
00357 
00358   len_byte = len;
00359   //if(org == ORG_DB) len_byte *= 2;
00360   //if(org == ORG_Z)  len_byte *= 2;
00361   //if(org == ORG_T)  len_byte *= 2;
00362 
00363   if((plc_type == S5 || plc_type == S7_300 || plc_type == S7_400) && fetch_write == 1)
00364   {
00365     length = sizeof(ih) + sizeof(fh);
00366     ih.version  = 3;
00367     ih.reserved = 0;
00368     ih.length_high = length / 256;
00369     ih.length_low  = length & 0x0ff;
00370     fh.ident[0]        = 'S';
00371     fh.ident[1]        = '5';
00372     fh.header_len      = 16;
00373     fh.ident_op_code   = 1;
00374     fh.op_code_len     = 3;
00375     fh.op_code         = 5;
00376     fh.ident_org_block = 3;
00377     fh.len_org_block   = 8;
00378     fh.org_block       = (unsigned char) org;
00379     fh.dbnr            = (unsigned char) dbnr;
00380     fh.start_adr[0]    = (unsigned char) start_adr / 256;
00381     fh.start_adr[1]    = (unsigned char) start_adr & 0x0ff;;
00382     fh.len[0]          = (unsigned char) len / 256;
00383     fh.len[1]          = (unsigned char) len & 0x0ff;;
00384     fh.spare1          = 0x0ff;
00385     fh.spare1_len      = 2;
00386     ret = rlSocket::write(&ih,sizeof(ih));
00387     rlDebugPrintf("fetch write ih ret=%d\n",ret);
00388     if(ret < 0) return ret;  
00389     ret = rlSocket::write(&fh,sizeof(fh));
00390     rlDebugPrintf("fetch write fh ret=%d\n",ret);
00391     if(ret < 0) return ret;
00392     ret = rlSocket::read(&ih,sizeof(ih),TIMEOUT);
00393     rlDebugPrintf("fetch read ih ret=%d\n",ret);
00394     if(ret <= 0) return ret;
00395     ret = rlSocket::read(&fa,sizeof(fa),TIMEOUT);
00396     rlDebugPrintf("fetch read fa ret=%d\n",ret);
00397     if(ret <= 0) return ret;
00398     if(fa.error_block != 0) return -1;
00399     ret = rlSocket::read(buf,len_byte,TIMEOUT);
00400     rlDebugPrintf("fetch read buf ret=%d\n",ret);
00401     if(ret <= 0) return ret;
00402   }
00403   else
00404   {
00405     i = 0;
00406     pdu[i++] = 0x02;  // [0]
00407     pdu[i++] = 0xF0;  // [0]
00408     pdu[i++] = 0x80;  // [0]
00409     pdu[i++] = 0x32;  // [0]
00410     pdu[i++] = 0x01;  // [0]
00411     pdu[i++] = 0x00;  // [0]
00412     pdu[i++] = 0x00;  // [0]
00413     pdu[i++] = 0x00;  // [0]
00414     pdu[i++] = 0x00;  // [0]
00415     pdu[i++] = 0x00;  // [0]
00416     pdu[i++] = 0x0E;  // [0]
00417     pdu[i++] = 0x00;  // [0]
00418     pdu[i++] = 0x00;  // [0]
00419     pdu[i++] = 0x04;  // [0]  read
00420     pdu[i++] = 0x01;  // [1]
00421     pdu[i++] = 0x12;  // [2]
00422     pdu[i++] = 0x0A;  // [3]
00423     pdu[i++] = 0x10;  // [4]
00424     pdu[i++] = 0x02;  // [5] 
00425     pdu[i++] = len_byte / 256;              //0x00;  // [6]  len/bytes
00426     pdu[i++] = len_byte & 0x0ff;            //0x40;  // [7]  len/bytes
00427     pdu[i++] = dbnr / 256;                  //0x00;  // [8]  dbnum
00428     pdu[i++] = dbnr & 0x0ff;                //0x01;  // [9]  dbnum
00429     pdu[i++] = getOrg(org);                 //10 
00430     pdu[i] =  (start_adr/256) & 0x0ff;      //0x00;  // [11] start adr/bits
00431     if (plc_type == S7_200) pdu[i] = start_adr / 0x10000;
00432     i++;
00433     pdu[i++] = ((start_adr*8)/256) & 0x0ff; //0x00;  // [12] start adr/bits
00434     pdu[i++] =  (start_adr*8)      & 0x0ff; //0x00;  // [13] start adr/bits
00435     ret = write_iso(pdu,i);
00436     if(ret < 0) return ret;
00437     ret = read_iso(pdu);
00438     if(ret < 0) return ret;    
00439     if(pdu[15] != 0x04) return -1;
00440     if(pdu[16] != 0x01) return -1;
00441     i = 21;
00442     if(ret < i+len_byte) return -1;
00443     for(int ibuf = 0; ibuf < len_byte; ibuf++)
00444     {
00445       buf[ibuf] = pdu[i++];
00446     }
00447   }
00448 
00449   return len_byte;
00450 }
00451 
00452 int rlSiemensTCP::read_iso(unsigned char *buf)
00453 {
00454   int i,ret,len;
00455 
00456   ret = rlSocket::read(&ih,sizeof(ih),TIMEOUT);
00457   if(ret < 0)                 { rlSocket::disconnect(); return ret; }
00458   if(ih.version != 3)         { rlSocket::disconnect(); return -1;  }
00459   len = ih.length_high*256 + ih.length_low - 4;
00460   if(len <= 0)                { rlSocket::disconnect(); return -1;  }
00461   if(len > (int) sizeof(pdu)) { rlSocket::disconnect(); return -1;  }
00462   ret = rlSocket::read(buf,len,TIMEOUT);
00463   if(ret < 0)                 { rlSocket::disconnect(); return ret; }
00464   if(rlDebugPrintfState != 0)
00465   {
00466     ::printf("read_iso() len=%d\n", len);
00467     for(i=0; i<len; i++) ::printf("%02x,",buf[i]);
00468     ::printf("\n");
00469   }
00470   return len;
00471 }
00472 
00473 int rlSiemensTCP::write_iso(unsigned char *buf, int len)
00474 {
00475   int i,ret;
00476 
00477   if(rlSocket::isConnected() == 0) doConnect();
00478   if(rlSocket::isConnected() == 0) return -1;
00479   ih.version  = 3;
00480   ih.reserved = 0;
00481   ih.length_high = (len+4) / 256;
00482   ih.length_low  = (len+4) & 0x0ff;
00483   ret = rlSocket::write(&ih,sizeof(ih));
00484   if(ret < 0) { rlSocket::disconnect(); return ret; }  
00485   ret = rlSocket::write(buf,len);
00486   if(ret < 0) { rlSocket::disconnect(); return ret; }
00487   if(rlDebugPrintfState != 0)
00488   {
00489     ::printf("write_iso() len=%d\n", len);
00490     for(i=0; i<len; i++) ::printf("%02x,",buf[i]);
00491     ::printf("\n");
00492   }
00493   return len;
00494 }
